website_summaries.verdict: Challenges kids to solve the puzzle that includes their favorite Paw Patrol characters. It also makes an affordable gift.
pros: A large floor puzzle (13-inch by 24-inch) that features all the Paw Patrol pups when each of the 25 pieces is in place
Large, soft pieces are easy for little kids to put together
cons: Very rare reports of missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy for a 2 year old to solve.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old son for Christmas. Me being paranoid I put it together to make sure I have all of the pieces which I do. It’s a little faded in a area but he won’t care since he just loves paw patrol.
customer_reviews.author: Lilvampire+darkangel

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle but small box causes frustration
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this puzzle - the thickness makes it easier for my three year old since it stays where you put it. My only complaint is that the box it comes in is so small it’s really hard to get all the pieces back in. My kids are not able to do it so I end up having to clean this one up. Overall a great puzzle I just need to get another container for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to love this!! She is a big paw patrol fan, this is cute, fun, and will encourage and nurture her problem solving skills. And I loved that I didnt have to pay an outrageous price, but at any cost it will be worth the smile on her face when she opens it up Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffnsara

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good material, 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son absolutely loves this puzzle! After putting it together so many times he can do it by himself, and when I say so many times I mean multiple times every day! The pieces are perfect for little toddler hands and the whole size of the puzzle is great because my son has to move/stretch from his sitting position to connect the top pieces. The thickness of the pieces makes them wonderfully durable and doing the puzzle on carpet has been easy. Once the pieces are put together they stay together which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal puzzle for little hands.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old Grandson is very much into puzzles. This one is a big hit with him. The 25 large pieces are perfect for his little hands and the colors are bright and appealing. He has done it repeatedly and its large finished size is impressive and gives him a feeling of accomplishment. It is an ideal puzzle for little ones especially because it is sturdy and durable. If you have a little one who loves puzzles then this is the puzzle to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jule Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old loves this puzzle. I love that I don’t have to worry about the pieces being ripped or bent or ruined. HOWEVER, I wasn’t happy with the system of picking one puzzle at random. I hoped if I ordered two, I would get one of each puzzle. That wasn’t the case. I received two of the same puzzle. I gave the extra puzzle to daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this puzzle and it has already survived some food ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this puzzle and it has already survived some food and juice spills and wipes off really easily. Was trying to keep it for a Christmas present but she spotted it so I gave in and bought a Minnie Mouse one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son loves this puzzle! He has played with it multiple times each day for a month, and it is holding up nicely. My only complaint is that he is unable to fit all of the pieces in the box by himself, as the pieces have to be arranged precisely for them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Durrability
customer_reviews.text: My two year old plays with this. He is too young to put it together correctly every time without help, but he is rough on it and it stands up well. An old puzzle we bought similar to this one started getting dirty and the edges frayed. This paw patrol puzzle has taken whatever my 2 year old boy has thrown at it with excellence. He spilled milk on it last week and it was easily wiped up with no issues ofor staining or messing up the puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My son aged 2 loves paw patrol and this is a great starter puzzle. It’s nice, thick foam and easy enough for him to work on by himself. The foam also makes it easy to build on the carpet. It is a bit smaller than I expected but we are very happy with this puzzle and get use out of it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Biteable
customer_reviews.text: Cute puzzle but it was no match for a 3 year old boy. It was bitten into chunks and broken up in no time. His mama was not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Household Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Foam puzzles have quickly become a favorite in my household. They are easy for little hands to put together, and clean up is a breeze. These are made out of thick foam and are holding up well to my two rough toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My nephew gave me a list of what to get his sons and this was an absolute hit. But I have no idea if it required assembly or just how durable or sturdy it is since I just wrapped the box and gave it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Although the size was a bit smaller than expected this is still a good quality product that my 3 year old nephew loves. It’s big to a 3 year old so I’m overall happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving many nice gifts for Christmas, this is literally the only thing my almost three year old daughter has played with. She absolutely loves it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Pawsome!
customer_reviews.text: These puzzles are pawsome! Vibrant colors, thick and easy to put together. But, the best is a happy child! Would definitely purchase more (well, I did buy two additional ones).
customer_reviews.author: CP1

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I can't give it 5 stars just yet as the little users haven't received it yet. I can say that I was del8ghted to find their favorite TV show on a toy they can play with together. Most importantly it is a floor puzzle that doesn't require an enormous amount of floor space. It arrived in pristine condition thus suitable for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. The foam back is thick, and very durable. Most importantly, my 3 year old daughter loves it. She wants to put it together a dozen times a day and has been able to do it by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby and toddler proof!
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite puzzles! Toddler and baby proof! My kids have been rough on this thing. They put it together and take it apart all. The. Time. And it still looks good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Lou

customer_reviews.title: Good puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old likes doing this puzzle a lot but needs help as it is an odd shape. The foam pieces seems sturdy and have held up even though he likes to rip them apart when done.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The pieces seem like they are sturdy enough to withstand toddler usage
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old has been enjoying the puzzle since receiving it for her birthday! It's just the right amount of difficulty to keep her engaged and she feels so accomplished after completing it. The pieces seem like they are sturdy enough to withstand toddler usage. Great product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Quitty Wit

customer_reviews.title: This foam puzzle is the best!
customer_reviews.text: The two-year-old little boy that I keep absolutely adores this puzzle! It is sturdy, easy to put together, and durable! This is a really great product!
customer_reviews.author: ESBurgin

customer_reviews.title: Puzzle time
customer_reviews.text: If youarelooking for afloorpuzxle that appeals to the current cartoon favorite of the young ones...this is It. Easy to connect and large pieces for young and old hands to grab.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Foam puzzles are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing what to expect but this puzzle is great! We have had it for 3 months and my kids complete it almost everyday, sometimes multiple times a day. They are 4 and 2. They love it and the best part is it can be done on the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: aeu13Cor1

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my nephew. It is well packaged and the colors are bright and vivid. Looks to be very sturdy for a toddler. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pozzi

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves it. After a few times with mom he can do it on his own now. Its seems to stand up to his usual 2 year old destructive ways
customer_reviews.author: Abbynonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loved it. She loves the thick wooded puzzles and this was no different.. she loves it and it's still small enough for her but it's got enough pieces to challenge her.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good puzzle for toodlers
customer_reviews.text: This are great for learning toddlers to do their puzzles. The only issue is that it’s not the sturdy and it looks like it might break if handled roughly by a toodler. Also one of the pieces wasn’t cut all the way but it was a simple fix but a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Binna Kristin Song

customer_reviews.title: Not big.. more of a puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to find dimensions for each piece and had purchased four of them to cover my sons floor.. they only come a 3x4 area lol
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a child who is almost 3. Designed in a way that makes it easy for young children to put together. Seems pretty sturdy despite some rough handling. Big hit with Paw Patrol fans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait for my son to open this on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi cuttino

customer_reviews.title: Fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: The puzzles are really nice. My son is 2 1/2 and he likes them. I need to help him little bit to put it together but he does most of the work.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fun puzzle for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I love how durable this puzzle is. My 3 year old is a little rough with getting the pieces to fit and it’s holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Deme C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun foam puzzle for small children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 5yr old granddaughter and she loves them. The sturdiness and durability is good and this foam puzzle is very giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, comfortable to to play with
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a year with this item and it is still in perfect condition and still used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice but missing one piece
customer_reviews.text: We received this puzzle in the mail today only to find one piece missing. My three year old who loves paw patrol was somewhat upset. Overall it's a nice puzzle and simple enough for a 3 year old to complete. I would probably give 4-5 stars if puzzle was complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a baby, not for a preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Awesome puzzle, but definitely meant for a baby. This was not a great gift for my 4 year old, it was way to easy. The foam pieces were great for my 7 month old, she loved playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bama2324

customer_reviews.title: Great kid’s puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson loves this puzzle. Favorite characters, large enough to manage in small hands, durable, washable and he can do it by himself. A big hit!
customer_reviews.author: peggy burns

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect puzzle for young kids. My daughter 2.5 loves this and is able to do it herself!
customer_reviews.author: TwoYearOldMom❤️

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Big easy pieces. My grandbabies, 2 &3 yrs love this puzzle. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MissLisaMBK

customer_reviews.title: Big pieces; nice colors for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large puzzle pieces that a toddler can do. It's a good size but not huge (read the dimensions). It's not going to spread out over your floor. Vivid colors and it's holding up well. My son likes to chew the pieces a bit but so far no damage. (He's 3)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My nearly 4 year old, loves this puzzle and does it over and over again.. I love the thickness of the foam for when little sis (17 months) gets a piece..
customer_reviews.author: Kj Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Great foam puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This is the third foam puzzle I’ve bought for my grandson. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were small than i thought but my daughter loves it. So i am good
customer_reviews.author: HappyCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old loves this and chooses to get it out. Easy enough to do but not boring.
customer_reviews.author: Andey K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was definitely worth the price. My 2 year old loves it and the foam pieces were large enough that he could put them together without bending all the small keyhole pieces. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn B

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Love these foam puzzles. Very durable and fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3-4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 3 year old, she is able to do it herself. The puzzle is great quality as well.

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard great for floors not easy to rip or tare
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. It's great for little ones just starting puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed teaching my granddaughter about putting together the puzzle and in no time she was doing it all by herself and she's only two.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this puzzle. The foam pieces make the durability great and the picture is bright and clear.

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol fans love this
customer_reviews.text: The 3 year old boy that I gave to on his birthday loved it!

customer_reviews.title: "floor puzzle" is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Description states foam floor puzzle and it definitely is not a floor puzzle. Guess when you fail to check dimensions you get what you pay for. Corner table puzzle is more like it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: She's a big fan of Paw Patrol so this was the perfect gift for her
customer_reviews.text: My three year old niece loves this puzzle. She's a big fan of Paw Patrol so this was the perfect gift for her. The size of each piece makes it easy to grab onto and I'm sure a younger kid would have no problem with the pieces either
customer_reviews.author: Jacobv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this puzzle and it’s the perfect size for a 3 year old!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wish they made more of these. My 2yr old daughter LOVES this. Like puts it together st least once a day loves it. Good quality, has held together well so far

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than anticipated. Thick foam puzzle pieces. Not flimsy. My little boy was very happy with this.

customer_reviews.title: Paw patrol is on a roll
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is so cute. A must have for a child who loves paw patrol.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my granddaughters for Christmas. She loves puzzles and PawPatrol. So couldn't be more perfect for her.

customer_reviews.title: Good durable
customer_reviews.text: Good! Durable. Perfect for my 2yr old son. Drooly hands, messy hands not a problem, will not rip/melt like cardboard puzzles do.
customer_reviews.author: Miks

customer_reviews.title: ... puzzle pieces and durable material make this puzzle a great learning experience
customer_reviews.text: Large size puzzle pieces and durable material make this puzzle a great learning experience. Helps to develop visual discrimination skills, motor skills and reasoning skills. Perfect for young children.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old able to complete the puzzle independently. Decent size and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a lightning deal for my friends son. She just had another baby, so the foam is great. It's easy to clean and doesn't get ruined if the baby sticks a piece in her mouth. Her son loved putting it together too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, large
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old is nuts for this puzzle. She puts it together everyday. Good construction, large, sturdy foam pieces. Can’t wait to order more.

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle for 3 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES putting this puzzle together over and over again. It's a great size for a 3 year old to play with and they will have a harder time losing the pieces because of their size.

customer_reviews.title: It would have been a excellent puzzle if we would have gotten the intended 25 ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a excellent puzzle if we would have gotten the intended 25 pieces instead of 24. The box the actual puzzle was in also looked like it have been playing previously opened and taped back together
customer_reviews.author: lisa draves

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. It took my 3 year old nephew less than 10 minutes to complete, but he loved putting it together!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who just turned three came to stay with me for a week. She absolutely loved the puzzle. She was able to put the puzzle together by herself. I saw her bend a couple pieces and it did not tear. I would highly recommend this puzzle for a 3 year old.

product_meta.title: Gift Item Paw Patrol Foam Floor Puzzle by Cardinal (25 Piece), Multicolor
product_meta.description: Watch your favorite pups come to life as you put together this super giant foam Paw Patrol puzzle! Perfect for constructing on the floor, when assembled this puzzle measures 13 inches by 24 inches. Its large, soft foam pieces are perfect for little hands, and 25 pieces presents a fun challenge to young puzzlers.
feature_bullets: 25 piece puzzle featuring your favorite Paw Patrol characters
Huge puzzle is perfect for floors
Large and soft pieces are great for tiny hands
Fun and challenging for the little ones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,091 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
